content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 5392020 the case is about seeking compensation and the first instance court ruled in favor of compensation which was upheld by the supreme court the final resolution is that the movable property involved will be divided equally between the plaintiff and the defendant the supreme court dismissed the application for revision the specific laws mentioned are the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the court ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiff a sum of 4763264 eur along with interest the court also ordered another payment of 295000 eur with interest the court dismissed an action and a counterclaim made by the parties involved without providing details the defendant is seeking permission to appeal the judgment to the supreme court questioning various aspects related to the division of property the supreme court dismissed the defendants application for review based on the conditions outlined in the civil procedure act

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 539/2020, 16. 6. 2021
